============
Installation
============

To install **pkdnn**, first download the package from
:download:`here <https://github.com/mbelotti-nuk/PK-neuralnet>` 

Linux 
-----

Go to the root folder and using the Makefile available (make should be installed in your pc) type:

.. code-block:: console

   $ make install

Note that the commands in the Makefile are written for a linux environment.


Windows
-------

Go to the root folder and type:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pyton.exe setup.py install
